enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Chair Thorgeirsson recalled that informal consultations had been conducted by Sue Barrell (Australia) and David Lesolle (Botswana).

Sue Barrell informed delegates that the meetings had resulted in draft conclusions that included agreement on the urgency of implementing action plans developed from regional workshops, and that identified priority areas of concern in the global monitoring systems for climate.
Delegates adopted the draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/L.3) without amendment.
